hazard_cases: An object or obstacle is blocking the path.
A person or vehicle is moving unpredictably in a restricted area.
A stationary vehicle is obstructing a main route.
Environmental conditions are reducing visibility or traction.
An animal or pedestrian is crossing in an unsafe manner.
no_hazard_cases: Traffic is moving smoothly without obstructions.
Pedestrians and vehicles are following designated paths.
Stationary objects are in designated safe zones.
Road and environmental conditions are clear and stable.
All entities are behaving predictably within expected boundaries.
